datasetStructure.directoryDescription: This directory contains data collected through an wearable fitness tracker.

relatedStandard.standardDescription: The CDS is a standard for consistently structure and describing clinical research datasets

relatedStandard.standardDescription: Open mHealth is the leading mobile health data interoperability standard.
relatedStandard.standardUse: All the data files within this directory follow the Open mHealth format
